experience.title: Founder & Managing Partner
experience.description: Asisa is currently in the process of setting up a fund focused on secondary opportunities. Asisa also operates the website, www.vcify.online, which runs specialized programs on venture capital industry.
experience.description_html: Asisa is currently in the process of setting up a fund focused on secondary opportunities. Asisa also operates the website, www.vcify.online, which runs specialized programs on venture capital industry. <!---->

experience.title: Director - Brand Capital
experience.description: Key consumer-tech investments included Yatra, Snapdeal, Grofers, Shopclues, Faircent, MobiKwik, Koovs,  Healthians, GoMechanic, Infibeam, Country Delight, Uber and Airbnb.Brand Capital is the investment arm (CVC) of The Times Group.Led an investment team focused on investing in consumption businesses.  I was responsible for  evaluating businesses, creating proprietary deals, negotiating and structuring investments, managing the portfolio and exits. I was also a member of the Investment Committee; and occupied board/ observer position in some investments. I managed an investment portfolio of approximately $400 m and also jointly led an  accelerator established in JV with GSV Labs (USA).
experience.description_html: Key consumer-tech investments included Yatra, Snapdeal, Grofers, Shopclues, Faircent, MobiKwik, Koovs, Healthians, GoMechanic, Infibeam, Country Delight, Uber and Airbnb.Brand Capital is the investment arm (CVC) of The Times Group.Led an investment team focused on investing in consumption businesses. I was responsible for evaluating businesses, creating proprietary deals, negotiating and structuring investments, managing the portfolio and exits. I was also a member of the Investment Committee; and occupied board/ observer position in some investments. I managed an investment portfolio of approximately $400 m and also jointly led an accelerator established in JV with GSV Labs (USA).

experience.title: Sr. Vice President
experience.description: SUN Group deployed capital ($ 2 billion globally) through operating platforms as well as through  funds. Some of the private equity platforms developed include SUN Capital Partners, WestBridge Capital and SUN-Apollo Real Estate Fund.
